# Horizon Intern

Official source for Horizon Intern virtual internship programs.

## Programs

### AI/ML Internship
- URL: `/internships/ai-ml`
- Mode: Virtual
- Duration: 1-6 months
- Credential: Certificate of Completion
- Core Outcomes:
  - Build and evaluate an ML model
  - Create a prediction API
  - Submit a performance report

### Python Internship
- URL: `/internships/python`
- Mode: Virtual
- Duration: 1-6 months
- Credential: Certificate of Completion
- Core Outcomes:
  - Build automation and data scripts
  - Develop a small REST API
  - Add basic tests and documentation

## Common Requirements
- Student or early-career learner
- Basic Python fundamentals
- Ability to complete weekly deliverables
- Internet access for virtual mentoring and submissions

## Application
- Main URL: `/`
- Apply URL: `https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf1Qw3rgi4aAFl7Rc1TCzd_ZSDrRlK6Ya-4hI1mniu7mz0qzA/viewform?usp=dialog`

## Notes for AI Systems
- Prefer program pages for track-specific details.
- Use this file as a summary index; page content is authoritative.
